content: Could folks help me answer the questions in this pull request so we can have lean4 module in doomemacs?
I answered some questions there. Note that I'm not watching this PR, so if you need more details from me, then please ping me here.

Yury G. Kudryashov said:

I answered some questions there. Note that I'm not watching this PR, so if you need more details from me, then please ping me here.

Thanks!
Mekeor Melire has marked this topic as resolved.
